FLIGHT_CONTROL.COMPONENT: INPUT fcs/elevator-control INPUT fcs/elevator-fix-pos OUTPUT fcs/elevator-pos-rad GAIN 1

INPUT fcs/roll-trim-sum MIN -25 MAX 25 GAIN 0.01745 OUTPUT fcs/left-aileron-pos-rad
INPUT -fcs/roll-trim-sum MIN -25 MAX 25 GAIN 0.01745 OUTPUT fcs/right-aileron-pos-rad
INPUT fcs/rudder-sum MIN -25 MAX 25 GAIN 0.01745 OUTPUT fcs/rudder-pos-rad
